level.text: The purpose of this chapter is to establish standards and guidelines for the submission of applications for grants to the District of Columbia Sports Commission (the “Commission”).

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is section 7 of D.C. Law 10-152, “the Omnibus Sports Consolidation Act of 1994,” D.C. Code § 2-4006 (1999 Supp.).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 44 DCR 5506 (September 26, 1997); incorporating by reference the text of Proposed Rulemaking published at 44 DCR 4705 (August 15, 1997).
